name: Escape Rooms
description:
You were trapped in a room by a mad scientist named Carl. Your goal is to escape there are multiple rooms to go through the more rooms you go through the more dangerous it gets. But also the closer you get to freedom. Escape and live a happy happy life. Good luck solider hahahahahahahaha. At this moment there are only 7 levels because it is in early access we will be releasing more updates soon.

If you would like to make suggestions on what you think should be added to the game please comment bellow

----------------------------------------------------------------------------

System requirements

  • 4GB of ram
  • 1GB of available disk space
  •  Windows 7+

----------------------------------------------------------------------------

Available On

Windows 64 bit - Available

Windows 32 bit - Coming Soon
